amendment.description: Amendment sought to decrease funding for the Economic Support Fund by $14 million and decrease funding for International Military Education and Training by $1.4 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in the Congressional Record to decrease funding for the Economic Support Fund by $14 million and decrease International Military Education and Training by $1.4 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Torres amendment (A007) Failed by voice vote.
